data.name: Blazing Worldstars
data.detailed_description:
Blazing Worldstars is a 2D traditional fighter, using sprite work for animations as a call back to the 90s era of classic arcade fighters by SNK/NeoGeo and Capcom. This game is a 6 button fighter, like every 2D fighter, there are special moves, throws, and super moves. This is enhanced by the mix of fast paced KoF like combat, parries of SF3S, and the Enhance System, somewhat like the V trigger system other than it giving fighters strong abilities and tools special to them, some may have more than one "Warrior Instinct".

The Enhance System can also radically change a fighter, from a typical damage or movement buff, armored specials, foregoing charge motion requirements, accessing special moves they normally can't, or outright having their special moves change around entirely, it can make or break a fight, especially if you may be in a pinch.

Try out the free demo while you wait for the full release!

data.short_description: Fast Paced Arcade Fighting, inspired by the likes of King of Fighters and Street Fighter, Blazing Worldstars is a game that seeks to relive the 90s arcade era of classic fighting games!!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD graphics
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek Audio
